about_the_game:
Welcome to an immersive audio-only adventure where sight is no longer necessary. Navigate through soundscapes, relying solely on your ears to guide you.



Key Features:

Sonar Navigation: Use sonar pings to map out your surroundings and find your way through uncharted territories.
Follow the Music: Let the sound of music lead you to hidden entrances and important locations.
Encounter Snake Enemies: Beware of the snakes that lurk in the shadows. Listen carefully for their hisses and slithers to avoid danger.
Immersive Audio Experience: Dive into a richly detailed world brought to life through high-quality sound design. Every sound tells a story and helps you on your journey.
Simple Controls: Intuitive and accessible controls ensure that players of all abilities can enjoy the game.
No Graphics, Only Sound: Experience a game where your hearing is your most powerful tool. The absence of visuals creates a unique challenge and an unparalleled immersion.



Can you rely on your auditory skills to reach the entrance and complete your mission? Plug in your headphones and step into a world where sound is everything.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 405
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
